job.title: Biometrics Analyst SME
job.description:
Position Summary

The Biometrics SME will provide technical support to the PM DoD Biometrics Chief Engineer. Provide testing capabilities in support of the DoD acquisition process by allowing anyone to test devices and or software against the Department’s biometric standards, ensuring not only the best technology in Soldier’s hands, but assuring the best infrastructure is there to support that technology. Additionally, provide SME and engineering, knowledge, skills and techniques to the enterprise products within the PM DoD Biometrics portfolio, including NATO support.

Duties Include, But Not Limited To

 Essential Duties and Responsibilities
  • Provide engineering support to assess and oversee the technical design, development, implementation, testing, and sustainment of PM DoD biometric systems.
  • Provides SME support to PM DoD on all matters related to biometrics and their application by/within PM DoD biometric systems.
  • Prepare papers, briefings, market research, and reports on biometric product capabilities.
  • Provide SME on identity management and biometric standards.
  • Attend functions of interest to PM DoD Chief Engineer, as well as meet with biometric product/service vendors, reporting salient information.
Requirements

 Minimum Requirements

Knowledge And Skills

The minimum years of related experience required:
  • 30 years in Systems and Software Engineering
  • 20 years in Biometrics and Forensics disciplines
  • 15 years in Standards Development, Adoption, and Maintenance
Education

The Minimum Level Of Education Required Is
  • BS in Physics, Mathematics, or related discipline
  • MS in Systems Engineering with emphasis in Software Systems
Other Qualifications

Outside of the above, other certifications, licenses, or clearances include:
  • Certified Biometric Security Professional (CBSP)
  • Certified Biometric Security Engineer (CBSE)
